Intro.Title: Spotify Premium Required
Intro.Description: Note: A Spotify Premium account is required for this plugin to work. Free accounts will not work. This is a limitation imposed by Spotify.

API.Title: Client ID and Secret
API.Description: You will require a NEW app for this version. Follow these new instructions: We need you to provide the 'Client Id' and 'Client Secret' for your spotify account. For instructions on how to get them
API.QuickLink: If you previously completed the above instructions:
API.SecretWarning: Note: NEVER SHARE YOUR CLIENT ID OR SECRET!!!
API.NextStep: Click the button and authorize the plugin in the newly opened browser tab

Pairing.Title: Linking Account
Pairing.Description: Please follow instructions in your browser...
Pairing.DescriptionPart2: Pro-Tip: If you get a INVALID_CLIENT: Invalid client message, you did not follow the instructions in the previous phase correctly! Go back and recheck all the app settings in the Spotify App Dashboard.
Pairing.PleaseWait: Please wait... If this takes more than 1 minute, restart the Stream Deck app

Result.SuccessDescription:
Enjoy using Spotify with your Stream Deck.
You may close this window.
Result.FailDescription:
We failed to link your account, please try again.
If you keep getting this error after ~10 seconds of linking, a Antivirus/Firewall/VPN is blocking the plugin. For support:
